  • Method Details

    • loadJavascript

      public static String loadJavascript(String path) throws IOException
      Take the path of a javscript file in linux format and converts it to load on any OS. (E.G. "src/main/resources/scripts/DragDrop.js") It returns the javascript file contents as a String for execution.
      Parameters:
      path - String The path to find the javascript file.
      Returns:
      String The javascript file contents.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read

    • findFilePath

      public static File findFilePath(String fileName)
      Returns the absolute path to the file searching the root directory of the project and any sub directories.
      Parameters:
      fileName - String the full (exact) name of file to be found
      Returns:
      File the path of the file found

    • searchDirectory

      protected static File searchDirectory(File directory, String fileName)
      Returns a File handler to a file if it is found in the given directory or any sub-directories.
      Parameters:
      directory - File the directory to start the search
      fileName - String the full name of the file with extension to find
      Returns:
      File the file that is found, null if nothing is found

    • getClassPath

      public static String getClassPath(String className)
      Returns a valid class path for instantiating a java class given a class name.
      Parameters:
      className - String the name of the class (case sensitive)
      Returns:
      String the path to the class that can be used to create an object

    • saveImage

      public static File saveImage(String subDirectory, String fileName, File imageFile)
      Saves an image File to an optionally set sub-directory of the configured, console set, or default "logs/images" directory. Can optionally save to the root image directory if subDirectory is null.
      Parameters:
      subDirectory - String the sub-directory to use
      fileName - String the file name of the image
      imageFile - File the File of the image to save
      Returns:
      File the resulting file object generated while saving to disk

    • saveImage

      public static File saveImage(String subDirectory, String fileName, BufferedImage imageFile)
      Saves a BufferImage to an optionally set sub-directory of the configured, console set, or default "logs/images" directory. Can optionally save to the root image directory if subDirectory is null.
      Parameters:
      subDirectory - String the sub-directory to use
      fileName - String the file name of the image
      imageFile - BufferdImage the BufferedImage to save
      Returns:
      File the resulting file object generated while saving to disk

    • readImage

      public static BufferedImage readImage(String subDirectory, String fileName)
      Reads an image from disk from the configured, console set, or default "logs/images" directory. Optionally can read from the root directory if subDirectory is null.
      Parameters:
      subDirectory - String the sub-directory to use
      fileName - String the file name of the image
      Returns:
      BufferedImage the image file read from disk

    • readImage

      public static BufferedImage readImage(File filePath)
      Reads an image from disk using the path passed with a File Object
      Parameters:
      filePath - File the file object that refers to the location of the file
      Returns:
      BufferedImage the image file read from disk

    • getImagePath

      private static String getImagePath(String subDirectory, String fileName)
      Returns the path for saving an image using the passed sub-directory, file name, and the configured, console set, or default "logs/images" directory.
      Parameters:
      subDirectory - String the sub-directory to use
      fileName - String the file name of the image
      Returns:
      String the constructed path as a String

    • convertPathSeparators

      public static String convertPathSeparators(String path)

    • sanitizeString

      public static String sanitizeString(String toSanitize)

    • winSpecialFolderConverter

      public static String winSpecialFolderConverter(String pathToProcess)
      Replaces Microsoft Windows special path shortcuts with their system environment equivalent within a given path

      Supported Path Shortcuts:
      • %localappdata% - Ex: C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Local
      • %appdata% - Ex: C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Roaming
      • %USERPROFILE% - Ex: C:\Users\USERNAME
      Parameters:
      pathToProcess - String path to replace windows special folder shortcuts
      Returns:
      String the path string with windows special folder shortcuts replaced with their environment equivalent path

    • setCurrentTestFile

      public static void setCurrentTestFile(TestFile file)
      Sets the current file under test.
      Parameters:
      file - TestFile the file to test

    • getCurrentTestFile

      public static TestFile getCurrentTestFile()
      Get the current file under test.
      Returns:
      TestFile the file under test.
